alert.note: Alert for Gates of the Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 10 at 2:06AM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches possible. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through Friday afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Gates of the Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
